extensionDescription.message: Enhances your browser with an animation that makes Ctrl+F results more noticeable!

isActiveReminder.message: FineFind is now active on this page!
isActiveReminder.description: Message is shown every time when FineFind is startet on a page.

error_isInsideIframe.description: Occurs when the selection is inside an iframe! Iframes are usually NOT accessible by JS in the main document (and therefore also by FineFind). As a result, this extension displays a large alert indicating that this and possibly subsequent results are not highlighted.

error_isInsideIframe_subText.message: This result, and possibly some subsequent results, are not accessible by FineFind.

error_rangeOutsideDoc.description: This is related to a problem when the selection is outside the page and therefore invisible.

setting_limitationsHint.message: Please keep in mind that this extension does not work on certain websites. Examples include addons.mozilla.org and addon configuration sites like this. This is due to Firefox-internal restrictions for your safety.
setting_limitationsHint.description: This is the text of the limitations notice.

setting_demo.description: This button links to a page where you can safely test the extension.

setting_limitationsReadMore.description: This button links to the limitations wiki page, where users can learn about all restrictions.

setting_thanks.description: This is the text for the information box on the settings page.

setting_moreInformation.message: Visit these pages for more information:
setting_moreInformation.description: This is the additional text for the information box on the settings page.

setting_website.description: This is the text for a button on the settings page.

setting_issues.description: This is the text for a button on the settings page.

setting_youtube.description: This is the text for a button on the settings page.

setting_getInvolved.description: This is the text for a button on the settings page.

setting_donate.description: This is the text for a button on the settings page.

setting_behavior.description: This is the title for a section on the settings page.

setting_showBannerOnActivation.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page. The user can decide whether they receive an 'is active' notification or not.

setting_showBannerOnFailure.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page. The user can decide whether they receive a notification when a result check failed, i.e., because the result is off the visible page.

setting_debounceTime.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page. The user can set the cooldown time in milliseconds between key presses. This prevents FineFind from showing its animation while typing.

setting_highlighterDuration.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page. Users can set their preferred animation time for the ring animation.

setting_highlighterRepeatCount.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page. Users can set how many times the animation should repeat.

setting_appearance.description: This is the title for a section on the settings page.

setting_highlighterHueDegree.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page.

setting_highlighterBrightness.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page.

setting_highlighterSaturation.description: This is the text for an option label on the settings page.

setting_unrestrict.description: A hidden button that converts number sliders into freely editable number fields.

setting_debug.description: A hidden button that logs all saved information to the browser's console.

setting_reset.description: This text is for an action button on the settings page. It will delete everything after confirmation.

setting_resetConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.
setting_resetConfirm.description: This text asks the user if they really want to delete all settings after pressing the reset button.

setting_standard.description: This text is for an action button on the settings page. It will hide the secret settings for experts.

setting_expert.description: This text is for an action button on the settings page. It will display the secret settings for experts.

setting_expertConfirm.message:
Open secret settings? 

Please be aware that some options may break this extension. Use them only if you really need to or have been advised to do so.
setting_expertConfirm.description: This text asks the user if they really want to open secret settings.
